sentences.sContent: Your willpower is an exhaustible supply, so don't force yourself to finish tasks if you don't have to.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your willpower is an exhaustible supply, so don't force yourself to finish tasks if you don't have to.
sentences.sCn: 你的意志力是会枯竭的，所以如果没有必要，不要强迫自己完成任务。

sentences.sContent: For the coal is an exhaustible resource, Determination of its rational mining scale, its sustainable exploitation and utilization have caught extensive attentions of governments and theorists.
sentences.sContent_eng: For the coal is an exhaustible resource, Determination of its rational mining scale, its sustainable exploitation and utilization have caught extensive attentions of governments and theorists.
sentences.sCn: 煤炭资源是一种可耗竭性资源，如何确定其合理的开采规模，实现可持续开发和利用已经引起政府和学术界的广泛关注。
